 2004-03782004-03-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActLaw Commission of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of BERNARD COLAS of Westmount, Quebec, to be a Commissioner of the Law Commission of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 24, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
